newsitem.title: MEXICO: Mexico livestock report, feeder export price -USDA.
newsitem.headline: Mexico livestock report, feeder export price -USDA.

text.p: USDA reported Monday that around 450 head were exported into the United States at two crossing points Friday.
Through Nogales, Ariz., around 300 steer calves were sold, although not enough to establish quote prices.
Through Hidalgo, Texas, around 150 head were sold, although insufficient numbers to establish market trend prices.
((--Chris Aspin, Mexico City newsroom +525 7289530)) E-mail at chris.aspin@reuters.com
